versos: (rained) Genesis 7:4 - "For after seven more days, I will send rain on the earth for forty days and forty nights; and I will blot out from the face of the earth every living thing that I have made.";;;
(pillar) 1 Kings 7:21 - "He set up the pillars at the portico of the temple. The pillar to the south he named Jakin and the one to the north Boaz.";;;

(gat) 2 Chronicles 14:7 - "Therefore he said to Judah, Let us build these cities, and make about them walls, and towers, gates, and bars, whilst the land is yet before us; because we have sought the Lord our God, we have sought him, and he hath given us rest on every side. So they built and prospered.";;;
(smoke) Psalm 104:32 - "he who looks at the earth, and it trembles, who touches the mountains, and they smoke.";;;
(jews) Romans 1:16 - "For I am not ashamed of the gospel, for it is the power of God for salvation to everyone who believes, to the Jew first and also to the Greek.";;;
(feared) Psalm 25:14 - "The Lord confides in those who fear him; he makes his covenant known to them.";;;
(cave) 1 Samuel 24:3 - "He came to the sheep pens along the way; a cave was there, and Saul went in to relieve himself. David and his men were far back in the cave.";;;
(preserve) Psalm 145:20 - The LORD preserves all who love him
(morrow) Genesis 19:37 - "And the firstborn bare a son, and called his name Moab: the same is the father of the Moabites unto this day.";;;

(moab) Isaiah 16:14 - And now the LORD says, "Within three years, as a servant bound by contract would count them, moab's splendor and all her many people will be despised, and her survivors will be very few and feeble.";;;
(dream) Genesis 37:5 - "Joseph had a dream, and when he told it to his brothers, they hated him all the more.";;;
(withheld) "Do not withhold good from those to whom it is due, when it is in your power to act." - Proverbs 3:27 NIV;;;
(suffered) 1 Peter 2:21 - "To this you were called, because Christ suffered for you, leaving you an example, that you should follow in his steps.";;;
(ears) "He who has ears to hear, let him hear." - Matthew 11:15;;;
(sawest) Job 42:5 - "I have heard of thee by the hearing of the ear: but now mine eye seeth thee.";;;
